condition.p: The blender is not blending properly

cause.title: The blender is not plugged in

step.cmd: Plug the blenders plug into the wall

cause.title: The blender is malfunctioning and needs to restart

step.cmd: Hit the restart button located on the right most side of the blender

cause.title: The mixture in the blender is too thick

step.cmd: Restart the recipe with more liquid contents or less solid contents

cause.title: The blades in the blender are worn out

step.cmd: Need to purchase new blender blades and put them in
